Key Match Events: Dallas closed the game on a costly 16-0 run.
Post-Match Reflections: Chauncey Billups felt like the Mavericks' player hit his player with a cheap shot.
Billups thought Camara was unjustly punished.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas survived with a narrow 117-111 win.
Camara, Portland's best defender, was sicced onto Lively all night.
Others: PJ Washington paced Dallas with 23 points, 14 rebounds, and 3 steals.
Camara finished 11 points on 4-of-14 shooting from the floor.
